name: Tandemania (SockJar)
description:
Ride a side by side tandem bike which doesn't have steering or brakes! The only way to turn is to have only one player pedal, or have the other player pedal in reverse to turn faster!

Can be played two player or single player.

A single controller is needed.

Made for the extra credits game jam in March 2019.

Creators:

Thomas Crowe

Barney Smith

Aidan Murray

Jack Chateau-loney
